properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:03AM CST until January 5 at 7:05AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Locust Fork At Sayre Affecting Jefferson...Tuscaloosa and Walker
Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is expected to fall over the next 48 hours...
and a flood warning is now in effect. The river levels are based
on forecasted rainfall totals and river levels may change
depending on actual rainfall amounts...

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Locust Fork At Sayre.
* from late Friday night to Sunday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:00 AM Wednesday The stage Was 8.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by early Saturday morning and
continue to rise to near 26.5 feet by Saturday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday evening.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thrusday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
